alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 10 at 2:37PM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
